title: All vaccinated adults should get a COVID-19 booster shot because of the omicron variant, CDC says
content:
1. All vaccinated adults should get a COVID-19 booster shot because of the omicron variant, CDC says  WLWT Cincinnati
  2. Doctor says COVID-19 booster shots will likely be needed once a year  Mid-Michigan now on FOX66 & NBC25
  3. CDC updates guidance to urge boosters for all individuals over 18 as omicron looms  Fox News
  4. US pushes boosters with new guidance  PIX11 News
  5. CDC Says Everyone 18 and Older Should Get Covid-19 Booster Due to Omicron Variant  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
All vaccinated adults should get a COVID-19 booster shot because of the omicron variant, CDC says  WLWT Cincinnati

CDC updates guidance to urge boosters for all individuals over 18 as omicron looms  Fox News
US pushes boosters with new guidance  PIX11 News

localize.title: オミクロンバリアントのため、ワクチン接種を受けたすべての成人はCOVID-19のブースターショットを受けるべきであるとCDCが発表
疾病预防控制中心说，所有接种过疫苗的成年人都应该注射COVID-19加强针，因为有奥米加的变体。
疾病預防控制中心說，所有接種過疫苗的成年人都應該注射COVID-19加強針，因爲有奧米加的變體。
